"A Voice to Change the World":
"Bethor Zelazny once said:
\"Nothing beats the impact of live
performances.\"

Wanting to capture raw, unscripted
footage, he wielded his clapper board with
gusto.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
